com.aeonphyxius.engine

Class GameRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aeonphyxius.engine.GameRenderer

  • public class GameRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    GameRenderer Object.

    All related rendering operations.

    This class contains logic to display enemies, player and firepower.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alejandro Santiago
